Posts.Content: May 6, 2013 09:05AM suzegirl wrote: I started weekly taxol with herceptin in March 2013.  I have had 6 treatments (6 of 12) so far and my hair is thinning quite a bit.  When can I expect to lose my hair?  It is thinning quite a bit and I am not sure if I should shave my head or see if I continue to lose more hair.  I have heard that some women have hair growth while on taxol.  If so, when does hair growth start while on taxol?
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
